content.howToPlay:
You’ll start with Campaign Mode. This is where you fight level by level, unlocking new unit types and getting the hang of the game. After Level 6, things really open up. That’s when you get access to Training Mode, a chill place to mess around with unit setups, and Online PvP, where you’ll go head-to-head with other online players.Before each battle, you get a top-down view of the battlefield. Take a second to scan the enemy’s formation. Use scroll to zoom in or out. Then, place your troops carefully. Frontliners up front. Archers and mages in the back. It’s all about balance and timing. Use your frontline units to soak up damage so your ranged units stay safe.After victories, you'll earn silver that you'll use to upgrade your troops. Don’t throw all your silver into one troop type. A balanced army goes further. Save your jade and sapphire for hero upgrades they make a huge difference in their swords.

Keep checking your loot chests. Even common ones can surprise you with useful stuff. And come back often to check if your chests are opened.

fullContent: Home› BattleKingdom Battle 3DBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenIf you're into free games that mix brainpower strategy with epic battle scenes, Kingdom Battle 3D might be your next obsession. This isn’t just another button-masher. You’re the commander here, calling the shots, building your army, and leading your troops into some seriously intense medieval battles. Knights, mages, cavalry, and magic spells flying everywhere. Stacking up combos in training, upgrade your hero or face off against real players in PvP, whichever mode you chose, you'll need to find new strategies to test out. This war strategy game has cool 3D graphics and a setup that feels like a mix of chess, tower defense, and Warcraft-style planning. If you're looking for a strategy game that actually feels rewarding and doesn’t hold your hand the whole time, Kingdom Battle 3D delivers. Build smart, fight hard, and maybe even dominate the global leaderboard. Let's begin!How to Play Kingdom Battle 3DYou’ll start with Campaign Mode. This is where you fight level by level, unlocking new unit types and getting the hang of the game. After Level 6, things really open up. That’s when you get access to Training Mode, a chill place to mess around with unit setups, and Online PvP, where you’ll go head-to-head with other online players.Before each battle, you get a top-down view of the battlefield. Take a second to scan the enemy’s formation. Use scroll to zoom in or out. Then, place your troops carefully. Frontliners up front. Archers and mages in the back. It’s all about balance and timing. Use your frontline units to soak up damage so your ranged units stay safe.After victories, you'll earn silver that you'll use to upgrade your troops. Don’t throw all your silver into one troop type. A balanced army goes further. Save your jade and sapphire for hero upgrades they make a huge difference in their swords.Keep checking your loot chests. Even common ones can surprise you with useful stuff. And come back often to check if your chests are opened.ControlsWASD / Arrow keys: Move the camera aroundMouse: Place troops and interactWhat Units Can You Use?You’ve got tons of options. Here’s a quick breakdown:Melee Units: Swordsmen are fast, axemen hit hard, and spearmen have solid reach.Ranged Units: Archers, spearwomen, and axe-throwers all bring the pain from a distance.Cavalry: Fast and heavy hitters on horseback. They have advantage over warriors on foot.Mages: Ladymages support and Sorceresses deal major damage.Heroes: Princes, paladins, and enchantresses can shift the whole battle when used right.Upgrades & LootEvery win gives you silver, which you’ll need to upgrade your fighters. Boost their health, damage, and even unlock special abilities. Stronger units = way better chances in later battles. You’ll also unlock loot chests along the way—some give instant rewards, others take a few minutes to open. You can keep up to 4 chests going at once, and if you need more slots, just watch a quick ad. Inside these chests? Gold, gems, and rare stuff like jade or sapphire to power up your heroes.DeveloperKingdom Battle 3D is made by FreezeNova, the same team behind tons of free online games that work great on both computers and phones.
